messages.subject: Re: First report of Saito Hajime ceremony
messages.msgSnippet: Tama is our fangirl kunoichi :) Everyone else please go to http://www.hino-shinsengumi.com *yes you will notice their new picture* [and] to get a report of
messages.messageBody:
Tama is our fangirl kunoichi :)

Everyone else please go to http://www.hino-shinsengumi.com
*yes you will notice their new picture*
[and] to get a report of their activities in Aizu please use
http://www.nifty.com/globalgate
at their message board...
http://8614.teacup.com/hijikata/bbs
and if you read -carefully- you will note that club members did get
to speak to Hijikata and Saitou's descendents...be patient nifty
translation is pretty good (^_^)

secretarytocapt3
AIM badgerturtle

messages.subject: First report of Saito Hajime ceremony
messages.msgSnippet: I ll post later more detail of this event with Aizu autumn festival reportand photos. Just I d like to tell you this year, a great grandson of Fujita
messages.messageBody:
I'll post later more detail of this event with Aizu autumn festival reportand
photos.
Just I'd like to tell you this year, a great grandson of Fujita
Goro,Mr.Fujita Taro attended at the Saito Hajime comemorative ceremony and he mentioned
again aboutthat unknown photo of Goro in the speech.
He said that the photo was taken in 2nd year of Taisho (1914), andseeing the
photo, he thinks Goro is a very tall man and looks like his grandfather
Tsutomu verymuch.

As I can't attend the symposium because of the train schedule, I don'tknow if
the photo was shown to public today, but we can expectsomething in the near
future.

Tama


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
